resources.string: Since %1$s, \n this much time has passed:
During this time, you have earned: %1$d EUR
Since the start of the month, this much time has passed:
During this time, you have earned 0.00 EUR
Welcome to WageWatch! \n This app simply shows you how much time has passed for the month. \n Additionally, you can enter your monthly income to track your real-time income.
